221105-title: Info about [Mirai] Collection Album & VENUS STAGE has been released
221105-desc:
"Collection Album [Mirai]" will be released at Feb 1, 2023. The first press limited edition will also contain the footage of VENUS STAGE "Yakusoku" at TACHIKAWA STAGE GARDEN on Jul 2, 2022.
VENUS STAGE "Mirai" will be performed on Feb 18, 2023 at PACIFICO Yokohama. To join the ticket lottery, pre-order the album & registering since Oct 18 to Nov 13, or registering since Nov 18.
